title: 46. Celebrity Esthetician Nerida Joy on Crafting Your Ideal Clientele, Leading with Your Heart, and Tough Love for your Clients!
description:
Hi Treatment Roomies! This was a super exciting episode for us - Nerida is a huge inspiration to us and it was a joy to talk with her about her journey from esthetics in Australia, opening her own business at age 19, health struggles, and becoming an inspiring and hugely successful celebrity esthetician in LA. We hope you LOVE this episode as much as we do!

Let us know what you think by leaving us a review! Looking forward to your feedback! Xo, Tess + Lo

Tess' Youtube interview with Douglas 

Preston's Website (tips, book a facial, buy his extractor tool)

Preston's mentorship resource

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com

Music by LiQwYd
